import { EmojiEmotions, LocationOn, LocalOffer, PermMedia } from '@mui/icons-material' import axios from 'axios' import React, { useContext, useRef } from 'react' import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext' const Share = () => { const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const {user} = useContext(AuthContext) const descRef = useRef() const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const post = { userId : user._id, desc : descRef.current.value } console.log(descRef.current.value) await axios.post("http://localhost:8800/api/posts/", post) } return (
  • Photo or video

) } export default Share
